Name: Treasure At The Top
About the game: You have a shield and a sword, or a powerful magic wand. Experience frantically slicing up monsters and magically releasing energy. It is your journey to conquer a 15-level tower and to uncover the mystery of the treasure at the top. Both a quick reaction and a strategic mind are beneficial for your success, but if you don’t have those, you will still be able to eventually discover the treasure by purchasing upgrades. Treasure At The Top has 7 different types of weapons and 15 types of monsters, featuring an evil mage, a white ghost, a cute rabbit, a big rock, and YOU the fearless challenger. If you’re coming for that treasure, you’d better prove yourself worthy.
